title: Legacy Of Kain - Defiance
description:
Legacy Of Kain - Defiance

Unleash Your Inner Evil. 
For The First Time Ever Play As Vampire Kain And His Archrival
The Soul- devouring Raziel.
Use Their Evil Destructive Powers To Attack And Destroy Your Enemies In 
This Dark Odyssey From Which Only One Of These Antiheroes Can Survive. Features: experience Both Characters Fearsome Battle Skills And Quests For Vengeance In Alternate Chapters.
Advanced Ai And Amazing Combo Moves Provide Intense And Enforced Combat.
use New Telekinetic Abilities To Pierce Enemies On Spikes Hurl Them Off Bridges
And Burn Them In Fires.
Feed Your Dark Hunger By Sucking The Blood And Devouring The Souls Of Your 
Enemies To Survive.increase The Power Of Your Weapon With New Enhancements Like Fire Lightning Ice And More. As Raziel Enter The Shadowy Realm Of The Underworld 
In The Spectral Plane.

------------------------------------------------------
InFo:

Publisher: Eidos Interactive
Developer: Crystal Dynamics
Genre: Horror Action Adventure
Release Date: Dec 17, 2003
ESRB Descriptors: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence

Game Information:

Number of Players: 1 Player
DirectX Version: v9.0
Operating System: Windows 98/2000/ME/XP

Recommended System Requirements:

RAM: 256 MB
Video Memory: 64 MB
Hard Drive Space: 2000 MB
